title: S3 Ep47: Publishing in economics
itunes:title: Publishing in economics
description:
Academic economists need to be published, but is the journal system fair and efficient? Sebastian Galiani and Ugo Panizza tell Tim Phillips about a new free VoxEU ebook that tackles racism in publishing, whether you should be judged by your citations, and the tyranny of the top five.Â 

Download Publishing and measuring success in economics.
